title: Determining $$x$$
text: To determine the value of $$x$$, add $$15$$ to both sides

title: Determining $$x$$
text: To get rid of e, apply ln to both sides, leaving only $$3x$$ on the left side of the equation

title: Simplification
text: Simplify the equation so only $$x$$ remains on the lefthand side of the equation
